relation: Staples Center (X Games Expert Men and Women only)
pageTitle: Boise, Idaho EnduroCross Track Map | Endurocross.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10807=2957 East Fairview Avenue, 8045=Irvine, CA (October 23, 2012) – The Idaho Center boast the largest floor used for the 2012 GEICO AMA EnduroCross series, which provides a large canvass for the sadistic track builders to work with. During the first trip to this venue last season, it was the extremely long and technical rock section that played havoc with the riders. The jagged, volcanic rock found in the area creates large cracks and crevasses that swallow the wheels and intimidate even the best off road racers. KTM’s Taddy Blazusiak will enter the series with a comfortable points lead but that does not mean that he can relax just yet. Monster Kawasaki’s Taylor Robert has emerged as the best of the rest thus far this season and he seems to be on the verge of getting his first ever win after multiple second places finishes. And Mike Brown, the X Games gold medalist always has the speed to win. Beta’s Cody Webb has been close to winning twice this season as well. Finally, Lucas Oil backed Colton Haaker proved he could win in Las Vegas and the Husqvarna duo of Kyle Redmond and Cory Graffunder are always a threat., 12287=2012 GEICO AMA EnduroCross Schedule, 10631=208.453.2222 ex 108}
textBeforeTable: 2012 GEICO AMA EnduroCross Schedule Like EnduroCross! For more information on EnduroCross, go to www.EnduroCross.com. For more information on the TV Coverage, check your local listings or www.motorsportshour.com. Snake River Yamaha 2957 East Fairview Avenue Meridian, ID 83642 (208) 888-6565 snakeriveryamaha.com Birds Of Prey Motorsports 721 Hannibal Caldwell, ID 83605 208.453.2222 ex 108 bopmotorsports.com Grizzly Sports 5604 Cleveland Blvd. Caldwell, ID 83607 208-454-8508 grizzlysportsusa.com Moto Tech 7126 West Victory Rd Boise, ID 83709 208-376-8324 mototechtuning.com Carl’s Cycle Sales 5550 West State St Boise, ID, 83703 208-853-5550 carlscycle.com The Boise event tickets are available at www.endurocross.com/buy-tickets/ or the Idaho Center Box Office and at the following local dealers: Like all EnduroCross events, the pit area on the backside of the Idaho Center will be open all day for free and the arena is also open for free for the daytime qualifiers and MVP Racing pro hot laps that determine the gate picks for the heat races. So plan to come early to meet the riders and see a full day of great action. Irvine, CA
textAfterTable: EnduroCross tracks incorporate various elements of extreme off road racing into a Supercross-style setting, including rocks, boulders, logs, sand, mud, a water-hole…and even a few special obstacles like giant tires thrown in!  Known as the “toughest racing on two wheels,” this indoor off road racing will certainly keep you on your feet. For the seven EnduroCross events, be sure to log-on to www.motorsportshour.com for local air dates/times for the Lucas Motorsports Hour on the Versus network. Visit www.minimotosx.com or www.endurocross.com.
